EmailTemplate.description: Includes customised PFQ RAIT in SG3
EmailTemplate.name: RTCM Welcome Pack PFQ_RAIT
EmailTemplate.subject: Participant Information: ENS Program for {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As part of the ENS International {!Contact.Program_Name__c} Program for {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}, please read the following information.
Date: {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} for the ENS workshop Time: {!Contact.Job_Start_Finish_Time__c} Venue:
{!Contact.Job_Venue_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Address__c} {!Contact.Job_City_State_PC__c}
Program Leader/s: {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c} Dress: Smart casual
Pre-Program Requirements
Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Click here to access the questionnaire. Note: This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others. Please ensure Java is enabled in your web browser.
We look forward to seeing you at the workshop!
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
